desc: |Permanent high tech filter|Never needs replacing|Anti microbial|Saves up to $300/year on disposable filters|No more monthly trips to the store to buy filters| Cleaner air to breathe|Less house cleaning and dusting|Removes dust, pollen and pollutants|No harmful ozone emissions|

layout.text: Never buy another air filter again.
If you don't have the right air filter, you become the filter. Change that today.
